description:
Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they`re no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La défaite des pirates au Chapeau de Paille !? Hody conquiert le palais Ryûgû
The Straw Hats Defeated?! Hordy Gains Control of the Ryugu Palace!
Команда повержена?! Дворец Рьюгу в руках у Ходи!
هزيمة الطّاقم؟! سيطرة هودي في قصر ريوغو!
一味敗北!? ホーディ竜宮城制圧
